docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Generic Content
Admonitions or callouts
docs.text:
Note

12

C'era una volta un giovane baldassare.

class Test():
    pass
Quali sono i tipi supportati?

note, abstract, info, tip, success, question, warning, failure, danger, bug, example, quote

mettere il + apre già le gambe

con inline mettiamo a lato sinistro, con inline end a lato destro.

docs.title: Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data
